column1: This file will be used to upload data to the NelsonDB. FIELD NAMES CAN BE ADDED, BUT SHOULD BE DONE SPARINGLY

column7: Definition
The experiment name to which this isolatestock is a part of.
The location name for where the isolatestock is located.
A unique ID in the format Af0001i. This is the ID that is printed on the isolatestock tubes. MUST BE UNIQUE
A human readable name for the isolatestock.
The plant organ that the isolatestock came from, if relevant.
Any additional comments about the isolatestocks.
The genus of the isolatestock.
The species of the isolatestock.
A more general classification of the isolatestock's genotype.
The isolatestock's alias.
The isolatestock's race classification.
The isolatestock's subtaxa classification.
The common name for the disease this isolatestock is known to be linked to.
The Row ID from which the isolatestock was collected. Example 08PN0023. Leave blank if isolatestock not collected from a row.
The Field Name from which the isolatestock was collected. Example Aurora NY. Leave blank if not relevant.
The Plant ID from which the isolatestock was collected. Example 08PN0023_001. Leave blank if isolatestock not collected from a plant.
The Seed ID from which the isolatestock is associated. Leave blank if not applicable.
The Tissue ID from which the isolatestock was collected. Leave blank if isolatestock not collected from a tissue.
The Microbe ID from which the isolatestock was collected. Leave blank if not applicable.
The Well ID from which the isolatestock was collected. Leave blank if not applicable.
The Plate ID from which the isolatestock was collected. Leave blank if not applicable.
The DNA ID from which the isolatestock was collected. Leave blank if not applicable.
The Culture ID from which the isolatestock was collected. Leave blank if not applicable.
The username of the person which collected the isolatestock. Example: firstname_lastname. Leave blank if isolatestock not collected.
The date when the isolatestock was collected. Format 2015-01-30. Leave blank if isolatestock not collected
The method which isolatestock was collected by. Example: Manual field harvest. Leave blank if isolatestock not collected
Any additional comments about the collection. Leave blank if isolatestock not collected.
The organization from which isolatestock was provided by. Leave blank if isolatestock not sourced from somewhere.
The first name of the person who provided the isolatestock. Leave blank if isolatestock not sourced from somewhere.
The last name of the person who provided the isolatestock. Leave blank if isolatestock not sourced from somewhere.
The phone of the person who provided the isolatestock. Leave blank if isolatestock not sourced from somewhere.
The email of the person who provided the isolatestock. Leave blank if isolatestock not sourced from somewhere.
Any additional comments about the isolatestock provider. Leave blank if isolatestock not sourced from somewhere.
Definition
The city, state, country, zipcode where the location is.
A descriptive name for the location. MUST BE UNIQUE
The building name. Example: Plant Science, Emerson
The room number or name
The shelf in which the isolatestock is located. Example: 1, 2, 3
The column in which the isolatestock is located. Example: A, B, C
The box which the isolatestock is in.
Any additional comments about the location of the isolatestock.

column2: For recording information about a locality.

column7: Definition
The locality's city name.
The locality's state.
The locality's country.
The locality's zipcode.

column2: For recording information about a specific field.

column7: Definition
The city,state,country,zipcode in which the field is located.
The field's unique name. MUST BE UNIQUE
The field's number.
Any additional comments about the field.

column2: For recording information about a disease.

column7: Definition
The common name for the disease. MUST BE UNIQUE
An abbreviation for the disease name.
Any additional comments about the disease.
